title: Jennifer Aniston dons glasses as she goes braless underneath a tailored navy pinstriped suit
text:
Jennifer Aniston meant business on Sunday.

The star wowed while seen in a tailored suit dipped in pinstripes and a rich navy color that she wore sans bra underneath.

The Friends vet, 50, accessorized with a pair of clear glasses with gold rims and a black crossbody bag.

Sleek: Jennifer Aniston meant business on Sunday in a tailored suit dipped in pinstripes and a rich navy color that she wore sans bra underneath

Aniston kept her signature blonde locks pin-straight and allowed them to cascade down her shoulders.

She kept her makeup minimal for the outing with just a touch of mascara and a nude lip.

The outing comes as Aniston joined Instagram for the first time on October 15th.

She reached 1M followers in just 45 minutes and has received over 1M likes on each post.

Sharp: The Friends vet accessorized with a pair of clear glasses with gold rims and a black crossbody bag

Aniston is determined to ensure that her habits on the platform don't become 'addictive.'

'I decided to get two different phones,' she told the Los Angeles Times.

'So one sits in my office and when that [Instagramming] has to happen, I’ll commit to that,' she said.

When asked why she was hesitant to join in the first place, her answer was simple.

Posh: Aniston, 50, kept her signature blonde locks pin-straight and allowed them to cascade down her shoulders

'The thing I don’t want to do, which was always a hesitation for me in the beginning, is be consumed by it,' she told the outlet. 'I don’t want to become distracted like that.'

She continued: 'I already get distracted enough by other things in life.

'But I’m very happy that it seems to have been a fun thing and that it seems to be well received.

'I could see how it’s fun to creatively put those little bits together, be funny, make fun of yourself and have fun just in general.

'And being able to connect with fans and it makes them very happy.'
